title: Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
content:
Hey. Yeah, there's been a few of them but only one of them has been completed. An early test version was released of another one.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
content:
Has anybody in Keen's history ever considered making a Keen-themed (with EGA colors and such of course) Duke Nukem 3D total conversion?------------------
SM: "I could go and write a page about the Theory of Relativity (or whatever it's called), but, what is the point if I don't know what the Theory of Relativity is?"

[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]

title: Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
content:
It seems to be easy with the proper tools (and knowledge of the .con file format). Duke Nukem 3D is the ultimate modder's friend IMO. You'd also need the proper inspiration, pizza, boots, etc.------------------
SM: "I could go and write a page about the Theory of Relativity (or whatever it's called), but, what is the point if I don't know what the Theory of Relativity is?"

[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]

title: Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
content: Not to mention that the source code has been released, which would make it even easier to mod.  Although given the choice I'd use the Shadow Warrior version of the engine instead, because they got sector-over-sector working well in that, and I'd imagine that a Keen game would have a lot of platforms...

title: Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
content:
I don't know of any Shadow Warrior mods. Although you could easily mod a hacked Duke Nukem 3D, since its source code AND Shadow Warrior's source code are both released under the GPL.

Yeah, sector over sector, I've been playing Shadow Warrior, it has some interesting tricks that were never used/implemented in DN3D.------------------
SM: "I could go and write a page about the Theory of Relativity (or whatever it's called), but, what is the point if I don't know what the Theory of Relativity is?"

[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]

title: Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
content:
Yup, building the game up from the SW or DN3D source code would be a nice idea to make a new Keen fangame, and it would make it very moddable too! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

I'm very capable of mapping Duke Nukem levels, but I have next to no experience with con file editing or editing the source code.

You'd probably want to use the JFDuke or JFShadowWarrior ports to make this, too. Or EDuke32.____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Anyone Making A 3D KEEN FANGAME???
content:
I'd prefer EDuke32, since its author is continously improving it (although he has not released the new source code yet... the latest snapshot is April 2007).------------------
